src:
Melihat Condet Zaman Dulu di Festival Djadoel
02 Nov 2019, 11:30 by Farih Maulana Sidik
Jakarta - Penampakan kawasan Condet, Jakarta Timur, zaman dulu nampak asri. Pohon-pohon rindang yang berjejer di sepanjang Jalan Condet Raya membuat kawasan tersebut terlihat adem.
Potret kawasan Condet zaman dulu bisa kita lihat di Festival Djadoel yang digelar pertama kali di kawasan Kramat Jati, Jakarta Timur (Jaktim) hari ini. Selain foto Jalan Raya Condet zaman dulu, ada juga foto rumah-rumah.


Foto-foto yang memperlihatkan Condet zaman dulu. Foto: Farih Maulana Sidik/detikcom

Festival Djadoel digelar di Lapangan Bola Bulak Rantai, Condet, Kramat Jati, Jakarta Timur, Sabtu (2/11/2019). Wali Kota Jaktim Muhammad Anwar hadir dan membuka acara tersebut.
Beberapa kegiatan digelar untuk meramaikan Festival Djadoel tersebut, salah satunya jalan santai. Selain pameran foto, di Festival Djadoel juga digelar bazar. Wahana permainan anak juga tersedia di acara tersebut.


Sejumlah foto Condet zaman dulu dipamerkan. Foto: Farih Maulana Sidik/detikcom

Wali Kota Jaktim, Anwar mengatakan Festival Djadoel digelar sebagai upaya melestarikan budaya Betawi. Anwar berharap kegiatan tersebut juga meningkatkan perekonomian warga Jakarta.
"Ini adalah salah satu kegiatan untuk memajukan destinasi wisata Condet. Tentunya Condet terkenal sejak dahulu dengan kuliner dan seni budayanya. Untuk itu, ini salah satu kegiatan untuk melestarikan budaya, tempat ekonomi, pembinaan kewirausahaan terpadu yang selama ini kita gaungkan untuk memajukan UKM warga di sekitar sini," ujar Anwar di lokasi.
text:
See the Old Condet at the Djadoel Festival
02 Nov 2019, 11:30 by Farih Maulana Sidik
Jakarta - The appearance of the Condet area, East Jakarta, in ancient times looks beautiful. Shady trees that line the Jalan Condet Raya make the area look cool.
We can see a portrait of the old Condet area at the Djadoel Festival, which was first held in the Kramat Jati area, East Jakarta (East Jakarta) today. In addition to old photos of Jalan Raya Condet, there are also photos of houses.


Photographs showing ancient Condet. Photo: Farih Maulana Sidik / detikcom

The Djadoel Festival was held at the Bulak Chain Field, Condet, Kramat Jati, East Jakarta, Saturday (11/2/2019). Jaktim Mayor Muhammad Anwar attended and opened the event.
Several activities were held to enliven the Djadoel Festival, one of them was a leisurely stroll. Besides the photo exhibition, a bazaar was also held at the Djadoel Festival. Children's rides are also available at the event.


A number of old Condet photos were exhibited. Photo: Farih Maulana Sidik / detikcom

The Mayor of East Jakarta, Anwar said the Djadoel Festival was held as an effort to preserve Betawi culture. Anwar hopes the activity will also improve the economy of Jakarta residents.
"This is one of the activities to advance Condet tourist destinations. Certainly Condet is famous for its culinary and cultural arts long ago. For this reason, this is one of the activities to preserve the culture, economic place, integrated entrepreneurship development that we have been putting together to advance SME citizens in around here, "Anwar said at the location.
